title: "Captain America 3" moves to downtown Atlanta
text:
After completing a scene at Fado, in the Buckhead Atlanta shopping district, "Captain America: Civil War" moved to downtown Atlanta this week. The Marvel project will film there for several days.
PAST COVERAGE:
Photos from the set
Chris Evans spotted toning his "monster" physique at Atlanta gym
Scarlett Johansson, Chris Evans spotted in Buckhead
Photo: Marvel
In addition, filming took place at the Buckhead W hotel. Evans, Mackie and VanCamp were among the stars filming at the upscale spot. Our source says filming took place throughout the hotel and in the lobby, but didn't have much intel, noting, "Security was tight!"
Up next, "Captain America: Civil War" films at an area church and a private school.
More later!
